title: Allows localities discretion in granting business investment exemptions
summary: Allows localities discretion in granting business investment exemptions on property tax by passing a resolution allowing the exemption for one or more of the following categories or classes: buying or selling of goods or services; the storing or developing of goods or services; the manufacturing or assembly of goods; or the processing of raw materials.
